channel.title: BlazeScape
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i1208.photobucket.com/albums/cc375/Ituharu_LilXCJ/BlazeScapeLogo.png[/img] [hr] [size=18pt]What is BlazeScape?[/size] BlazeScape is a custom server based on the 317 loading 377 era. The only difference is that it most likely will have skillcape models as well as animations and graphics. BlazeScape has a unique starting area based in Castle Wars. You cannot leave the area as it is blocked off by objects that fence the area. Skilling is done within the area of Castle Wars and combat is done through the guthix portal which sends you to the slayer tower where you will spend most of your time training. BlazeScape is supposed to provide a unique experience for players as they are forced to play within a small enclosure, forcing interaction with one another. This suggests friendly interaction which should bring the player base to a closer connection to one another. No new player is shunned and elitism is usually non-existent.
[b]Development Progress:[/b] Changing Homes Changing Experience Rate Loading up custom NPC spawn Loading up custom object spawn Load up custom shops Find a VPS/Hoster Get a forums Get a custom gameframe Load skillcape models/anim/gfx
[hr]
[b]Features[/b] Decent combat formula. Decent prayer bonus and drain formula. Most skills programmed (but need to be redone!) Custom area to train and skill! Constant updates! Unique currency, buy items with BlazeScape tickets! Custom music to enhance gameplay! Barrows and Duel Arena minigames! Fight Cave minigame (currently not accessable.)
[b]Developer(s): LilXCJ (Corey) Acans (Wade) Cocoa (Zac)[/b]
Media: Custom music [IMG]http://i1208.photobucket.com/albums/cc375/Ituharu_LilXCJ/blazescape1.jpg[/img] Shops along walls [IMG]http://i1208.photobucket.com/albums/cc375/Ituharu_LilXCJ/blazescape2.jpg[/img] Part of the skilling area [IMG]http://i1208.photobucket.com/albums/cc375/Ituharu_LilXCJ/blazescape3.jpg[/img] Woodcutting guild. Only one magic tree, making fletching and woodcutting more challenging! [IMG]http://i1208.photobucket.com/albums/cc375/Ituharu_LilXCJ/blazescape4.jpg[/img] More skilling, portals to different areas for skilling [IMG]http://i1208.photobucket.com/albums/cc375/Ituharu_LilXCJ/blazescape5.jpg[/img] Disclaimer for a high level training area. Rewards are huge here. [IMG]http://i1208.photobucket.com/albums/cc375/Ituharu_LilXCJ/blazescape6.jpg[/img] Auto-updating/downloading. Will update/download class files and cache files [IMG]http://i1208.photobucket.com/albums/cc375/Ituharu_LilXCJ/blazescape8.jpg[/img] Just proof of it starting up [IMG]http://i1208.photobucket.com/albums/cc375/Ituharu_LilXCJ/blazescape9.jpg[/img]
[/center]

item.title: BlazeScape
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

So far this has been the updates:

  • Auto cache downloader + automatic downloader for new cache/class files whenever we need to place an update.
  • Music works 100%
  • Going to begin a region system of sorts so I don’t have to place music methods everywhere and just let the region system do what it should’ve done in the first place.
  • Removed a lot more useless code
  • Still optimizing the source. Separating code out of clientHandler.java and putting it where it should be (not stuffed into a 400+kb file)

Cocoa and I have decided on this as far as items that aren’t 317.
We are adding skillcapes, defenders, and the barrelchest anchor. Getting defenders and the barrelchest anchor will be unique as I have plans for them when we do add them.

Also, we will probably be up for Pre-BETA pretty soon.

EDIT: Added some media to the OP.

EDIT2: BlazeScape gets released for BETA testing on November 3rd. Be sure to check it out!

Read full topic

item.title: BlazeScape
item.dc:creator: @gravenfire23 gravenfire23
item.description:
@gravenfire23 wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:44, topic:413404”][quote author=gravenfire23 link=topic=514906.msg3778017#msg3778017 date=1318247669]

blazescape itself is released?

BlazeScape Reborn is released. That was the source that we originally worked on. However, I pitched a bitch fit when we continued to add customs and I let the server die. However, we’re re-doing it without calling it “Reborn” and simply doing it my way.

[/quote]Every one knows cocoa loves him his customs

Customs are great, but don’t you think they’re ridiculous when we have like 30 different overpowered sets of bullshit? Lol.[/quote]Just like how runescape is now

Read full topic
